title: Release of gas to market completely disrupted: Laugfs Gas
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Laugfs Gas company states that the release of Laugfs Gas to the market has been completely disrupted.
The company cited failing to issue letters of credit in the face of the existing dollar shortage as the cause for this disruption.
A spokesman for the company stated that unloading gas consignments from a fuel ship at Hambantota harbor had also been severely affected.
Although News 1st attempted to get in contact with a representative of Laugfs Gas company, we were unable to ascertain further information regarding the distribution activities in the market.
